question_text:
Question 16 
 
The correct sequence of machining operations to be performed to finish a large diameter through hole 
is
Production Engineering (Metal Cutting) 
 
(A)  drilling, reaming, boring   
(B)  drilling, boring, reaming 
 
(C)  boring, reaming, drilling  
(D)  boring, drilling, reaming 
Ans. 
B 
Sol.
 
Drilling 
→
 Boring 
→
 Reaming
